title: GriefShare
description: GriefShare is a 13-week support series at the Bitterroot Valley Church of the Nazarene.

title: Service for Janet Wolfenden
description: A service to celebrate the life of Janet Wolfenden will be held this Saturday, the 4th. Graveside service and reception to follow.

title: Bitterroot Valley Living Center Ministry
description: Please come join us for a sweet time of worship and fellowship with the Living Center residents.

title: Communion Sunday
description: We will share the Lord's Supper together during our worship service.

title: Bitterroot Life Chain
description: This is an hour long commitment to silent prayer and public witness for the sanctity of human life.

title: New Sunday School Class!
description: Join us for a new Sunday School class starting October 26th! Christianity 101. We are diving into the study of basic theology. Contact the office for details.
